text: Dughiar kamɨn, Asiriaba bar arazir kurabar Judabagh amima, Hesekia arɨmariam inigha atam areme. Ezɨ Emosɨn otarim Aisaia ghua an ganigha kamaghɨn mɨgei, “Ikiavɨra Itir God kamaghɨn mɨgei, ‘Nɨn arɨmariam gɨvaghan kogham, a ikɨvɨra ikɨtɨ nɨ ovegham. Kamaghɨn amizɨ, nɨ gumazamizir nɨn dɨpenimɨn itiba, me mɨkemeghtɨ, me nɨn ingangariba bar dar amu dar kɨrigh.’ ”
